#generated by bfcmake
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0 FATAL_ERROR)

#name of project
project(rsa)


#version
set(rsa_MAJOR_VERSION 0)
set(rsa_MINOR_VERSION 0)
set(rsa_PATCH_VERSION 0)
set(rsa_VERSION ${rsa_MAJOR_VERSION}.${rsa_MINOR_VERSION}.${rsa_PATCH_VERSION})

set(GCC_COVERAGE_COMPILE_FLAGS "")

#source files
set(SRCS
	src/rsaKey.cpp
	)


#header files
set(HEADER
	include/rsaKey.hpp
	)


add_library(rsa STATIC ${SRCS} ${HEADER})

#linking libraries
target_link_libraries(rsa PRIVATE libtomcrypt)
target_link_libraries(rsa PRIVATE libtommath)


target_include_directories(rsa PRIVATE .)
target_include_directories(rsa PRIVATE include)
target_include_directories(rsa PRIVATE ../../include/.)


add_definitions(${GCC_COVERAGE_COMPILE_FLAGS})
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${GCC_COVERAGE_COMPILE_FLAGS}")

#end of cmake
